org.eclipse.persistence.platform.xml.jaxp

Class JAXPPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.persistence.platform.xml.jaxp.JAXPPlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLPlatform

    public class JAXPPlatform
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLPlatform

    Purpose: An implementation of XMLPlatform using JAXP 1.3 APIs.
